author: Source: Seattle Post-Intelligencer
title: Justice Dept. pressing for changes to computer crime law - Seattle Post-Intelligencer
text:
Int his June 17. 2009, file photo, former Hollywood private eye Anthony Pellicano is shown in court in Los Angeles. It's clearly illegal to hack into someone else's computer network and steal information from it.
 Seattle Post-Intelligencer.
